name: Pneumachinic
description:
Pneumachinic is a psychological horror/multiple-choice, choose your own adventure game where you are experience the life of the main character starting from birth! This character is unique like no one other on earth so he attracts attention.

Based on your choices you will be rewarded accordingly. Some are long term and others immediate.

There is no winning or losing in this game, no good or bad endings. It all depends on who you want to be. Just experience the story the way that it feels right with you.

___

Operating Systems:

  • Windows 32 / 64
  • Linux 32 / 64
  • Mac 64

___

If you want to get in touch, report bugs, or know more about the game, you can find me @SteliosWinters

If you want to find out more about my other projects, check out - SteliosWinters.com 

Thank you for visiting, and for those who enjoyed this page enough to buy it, I appreciate the support and I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed creating and testing it!
